speaker: Waystone
lines: You come to a standing stone covered in lichen.
Carvings lie shallow under the green.
A smooth place shows where many hands rested.
A crow feather sits in a crack.
A red ribbon is tied around the base.
The clearing is still when you speak here.
You decide what to leave and what to take.

choices.text: Lay your hand where warmth waits.
Break the ribbon and see who comes.
Tie your own ribbon and leave quietly.
